name: Hard Minus Classic Redux
description:
Hard Minus Classic Redux is a dynamic 2D shooter, which lets you take control of a lost soul, whose job is to solve problems in parallel realities. While using brute force, of course! During this mission, our nameless hero finds himself in the XIX century, when industrial and technological progress has just happened. Anomaly's epicenter is located in snowy taiga forest. So... that's where the journey begins.

- Smooth control.
- Dynamic fights with slow motion, roll-up, and rocketjumps.
- Various bestiary.
- Wide choose of guns.
- Competitive element stopwatch.
